org.araneaframework.jsp.tag.support
Interface ExpressionEvaluationManager

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultExpressionEvaluationManager, NopExpressionEvaluationManager, SpringExpressionEvaluationManager
public interface ExpressionEvaluationManager
extends Serializable

A custom plugin interface for JSP EL evaluation. Since there might be problems with the default solution where Jakarta taglibs is used, in Spring framework application the Spring solution for EL evaluation is automatically used. Anyway the EL evaluation can be overridden with any implementation using ConfigurationContext.

Since:
1.1.0.1
Author:
Martti Tamm (martti@araneaframework.org)

Method Detail

evaluate

<T> T evaluate(String attributeName,
               String attributeValue,
               Class<T> classObject,
               javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext)
           throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
The method handles EL evaluation with given data.

Parameters:
attributeName - The name of the JSP tag attribute.
attributeValue - The value of the JSP tag attribute.
classObject - The class name of the tag.
pageContext - The context to resolve variables.
Returns:
Evaluated value of the attributeValue.
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
